# Class TTSRequestData

Class for handling TTS requests in graphs. Extends BaseData with TTS request-specific functionality.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy getTTSRequest getVoice hasStreamContent hasTextContent

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources used by the TTSRequestData instance.

#### Returns void

Overrides BaseData.destroy




### getTTSRequest

  * getTTSRequest(): [TTSRequestInterface](/interfaces/common_data_types_external_tts_request_data.TTSRequestInterface)

Gets the TTSRequest data as an interface. If external is set, it will parse the external reference, else it will use the stored properties

#### Returns [TTSRequestInterface](/interfaces/common_data_types_external_tts_request_data.TTSRequestInterface)

The TTSRequest interface object




### getVoice

  * getVoice(): [VoiceInterface](/interfaces/common_voice_voice.VoiceInterface)

Gets the voice configuration.

#### Returns [VoiceInterface](/interfaces/common_voice_voice.VoiceInterface)

The voice configuration if available




### hasStreamContent

  * hasStreamContent(): boolean

Checks if the TTSRequest has stream content.

#### Returns boolean

True if the request contains stream content




### hasTextContent

  * hasTextContent(): boolean

Checks if the TTSRequest has text content.

#### Returns boolean

True if the request contains text content




### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
